title: Christmas with Anne and Other Holiday Stories
description: Celebrate Christmas with Anne of Green Gables in this keepsake collection of sixteen heartwarming holiday stories. Share Anne's delight at receiving the dress of her dreams, the joy of a young woman reunited with her long-lost brother on Christmas Eve, and the surprise of a trio of sisters who inadvertently end a family feud by arriving at the wrong uncle's house for Christmas dinner. This new collection of L.M. Montgomery stories includes these beloved tales, as well as many others that have never appeared in book form in the United States.L.M. Montgomery reveals the joys and trials of Christmas and the hope of the new year in this moving collection, which will be treasured by her fans and by all readers who enjoy an old-fashioned Christmas.
author: L.M. Montgomery
